## takeNth() function

Transducer which only yields every `n`<!-- -->-th value from the input source.

```
[...takeNth(3, range(10))]
// [ 0, 3, 6, 9 ]

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function takeNth<T>(n: number): Transducer<T, T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  n | <code>number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Transducer<T, T>`
